metadata.title: Cyqle | The Multiplayer Cloud Desktop for Humans & AI Agents
metadata.description: A persistent, shared environment for your team and your AI agents.

hero.title: The Multiplayer Cloud Desktop
hero.description: A persistent, shared environment for your team and AI agents

aiAutomation.title: Deploy Your AI Workforce
aiAutomation.description: Record any action to create reusable automations. Deploy agents to handle repetitive tasks.

cloudNative.title: Access From Anywhere
cloudNative.description: Your persistent cloud desktop. Pick up where you left off, on any device, at any time.

collaboration.title: True Multiplayer Desktop
collaboration.description: Invite your team to a shared session. See cursors, type together, and solve problems in real-time.

instantEnvironments.title: On-Demand Workspaces
instantEnvironments.description: Instantly launch secure, isolated environments for demos, new hire onboarding, or testing.

development.title: Development
development.description: Share dev environments, debug in real-time, and keep your entire team in sync.

qa.title: QA & Testing
qa.description: Automate UI tests, reproduce bugs in shared sessions, and collaborate instantly on fixes.

customerSupport.title: Customer Support
customerSupport.description: Instantly launch a shared session to see, guide, and solve customer issues in real-time.

operations.title: Operations
operations.description: Deploy agents to automate routine checks, data entry, and system monitoring. No code required.

aiSection.title: Put Your Work on Autopilot
aiSection.description: Bring your own agents or build new ones. Record actions to create powerful automations in seconds.
items: Automate any task with one-click recording
Schedule jobs to run anytime, on any site
Build a shared library of automations
Connect your stack with powerful integrations

items.quote: Cyqle has cut our customer resolution time by 40%. A game-changer for our support operations!
items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.quote: Our QA productivity has soared. Cyqle's automation has saved us hundreds of hours.
items.author: Michael Chen

items.quote: Cyqle has bridged the gap between our development and operations. Collaboration has never been better!
items.author: Alex Rodriguez

cta.title: A Truly Shared Workspace.
cta.description: Bring your team, tools, and agents together in one real-time cloud environment. It's time to work in perfect sync.

footer.description: The multiplayer cloud desktop for humans & AI agents.
